invocation.name: Band of Brothers (Shaman I)
invocation.boost: 2 points may be taken from each person touched.
3 points may be taken from each person.
invocation.description:
Allows adherents of the same deity to voluntarily transfer luck from themselves to the shaman. The luck can be used to replace luck which has been spent temporarily, and cannot take the shaman to above their normal limit. If the luck is not used by the time the shaman next prays to their god, then it is lost.
One point of luck may be taken from all those who touch the shaman at the time the invocation is invoked.

invocation.name: Initiation (Shaman I)
invocation.description: Initiates a person into the tribe, making them known to their god so that they may use luck.

invocation.name: Spirit Blessing (Shaman I)
invocation.description: A ritual in which the favour of the god or totem spirit is asked for. Those who partake in the ritual receive one point of luck, up to a maximum of two.

invocation.name: True Name (Shaman I)
invocation.description: Learn the unique true name of the subject touched.

invocation.name: Spirit Release (Shaman I)
invocation.description: A funeral ceremony. Spirit of the deceased may resist if they do not yet wish to go on their way.

invocation.name: Spirit Balm (Shaman I)
invocation.boost: Also heals a wound level, and all stuns.
invocation.description: When used on an injured person, stops bloodloss and stabalises the wound.

invocation.name: Spirit Walking (Spirit II)
invocation.description: The shaman's spirit is able to leave their body, and travel as an ethereal entity. The shaman cannot interact with the physical world, but can affect (and be affected by) other spirits. The shaman's body will appear to be in a coma whilst the spirit has left it.

invocation.name: Fasting I
invocation.description: Shaman is unaffected by thirst or hunger while the invocation lasts. The shaman cannot use this more than once a month.
